get.summary: Topic for delivery collection mailpiece event
get.description: Data provided by NEMO-ZUST for captured collection event for a mail piece.

DateTime.description: String @format date-time, as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example: 2014-05-22T10:42:42.542+00:00.

timestamp.description: The timestamp the event was captured.

capturingType.description: The input method used to capture the value

deliveryArea.description:
Number of the delivery area, e.g. 010.
Missing digits are completed with leading 0

distributionBasePostcode6.description:
The postal code 6 numbers identifying the distribution base,
e.g. 821070.

personalNumber.description:
The employee's personal number, e.g. 09000521.
The employeeId contains 8 characters (all digits).
Missing digits are completed with leading 0

productCode.description: The barcode's value of the additional service aka. PRZL

capturingType.description: The input method used to capture the value

productCodeCaptures.description: The captured additional products on the mail piece

mailpieceDataId.description:
ID to the mail piece data on which the delivery was made
Note: Previously, the attribute name "infoScanRecordId" was used for this.

multiCapture.description: Confirmation by the user that the same mail piece id needs to be captured multiple time, e.g. two mail pieces with the same id.

deliveryAttempt.description: Delivery staff delivered / tried to deliver sending on floor

notDeliveredReason.description: If deliveryAttempt = false, reason must be specified

postCapturing.description: Post capturing when something did not work out on the tour. Takes place in the base.

deliveryArea.description: Tour, district or service depending on process and organizational unit

If value is available, it overwrite *.deliveryArea
Number of the delivery area, e.g. 010.
Missing digits are completed with leading 0

distributionBasePostcode6.description:
If value is available, it overwrite *.distributionBasePostcode6
The postal code 6 numbers identifying the distribution base,
e.g. 821070.

accuracy.description:
The accuracy of the supplied coordinates in meters.
If we form a circle with a radius of collected.coordinates.geoPositionAccuracy meters around the point collected.coordinates.geoPositionX / collected.coordinates.geoPositionY, then the true location is in this circle with 68% probability. Probably a normal distribution, i.e. with probability 95% in the circle with radius 2 * collected.coordinates.geoPositionAccuracy.
The value 0.0 means that the precision is unknown.
See also https://developer.android.com/reference/android/location/Location#getAccuracy()

deliveryAttempt.description: Delivery staff delivered / tried to deliver sending on floor

notDeliveredReason.description: If deliveryAttempt = false, reason must be specified

FailureReason.description:
Possible values:
CUSTOMER_NOT_PRESENT -> Kunde nicht anwesend (1)
CUSTOMER_DENIES_DELIVERY -> Kunde lehnt Uebergabe ab (2)
UNKNOWN_ADDRESS -> Adresse unbekannt (4)
NOT_AT_APPOINTED_PLACE -> Sendung nicht am vereinbarten Ort (5)
NOT_PREPAID -> Sendung nicht frankiert (6)
INSUFFICIENTLY_PACKED -> Ware ungenuegend verpackt (7)
CONTENT_OVERSIZE -> Ware zu gross fuer Verpackung (8)
ORDER_UNKNOWN_AT_CUSTOMER -> Abholauftrag bei Kunden unbekannt (9)
FAILED_TO_RELEASE_OUT_OF_LOCKED_BOX -> Ausloesung aus abschliessbarer Box fehlgeschlagen (10)
NOT_PRESENT -> Sendung nicht vorhanden (20)
OVERSIZE -> Sendung mit Ãœbermass (21)
NEW_POSTING_WITH_OVERSIZE -> Neuaufgabe Sendung mit Ãœbermass (22)

accuracy.description:
The accuracy of the supplied coordinates in meters.
If we form a circle with a radius of collected.coordinates.geoPositionAccuracy meters around the point collected.coordinates.geoPositionX / collected.coordinates.geoPositionY, then the true location is in this circle with 68% probability. Probably a normal distribution, i.e. with probability 95% in the circle with radius 2 * collected.coordinates.geoPositionAccuracy.
The value 0.0 means that the precision is unknown.
See also https://developer.android.com/reference/android/location/Location#getAccuracy()

metadata.description: This metadata is only used by legacy systems, new consumers must not rely on it.

appVersion.description: The version of the app creating the event

appId.description: The id of the app creating the event

serverTimestamp.description: The timestamp the request was received by NEMO backend

appVersion.description: The version of the app creating the event

appId.description: The id of the app creating the event

serverTimestamp.description: The timestamp the request was received by NEMO backend

NotDeliveredReason.description:
Possible values:
DOOR_CLOSED -> Front door closed (1)
CUSTOMER_ABSENT -> Customer absent (2)
DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_ONLY_SEEN_AT_DELIVERY -> Delivery instruction (Zustellanweisung - ZAW) not seen until delivery (3)
OTHER_REASONS -> Other reasons (4)

NotNotifiedReason.description:
Possible values:
AGREEMENT_WITH_RECEIVER -> Agreement with recipient (1)
CALL_UNSUCCESSFUL -> Call unsuccessful (2)
NO_OR_WRONG_PHONE_NUMBER -> No or wrong phone number (3)
DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_ONLY_SEEN_AT_HANDOVER -> Delivery instruction (Zustellanweisung - ZAW) not seen until delivery (4)
TRIED_OTHER_NUMBER -> Tried another number (5)
USED_OTHER_PHONE -> Other cell phone used (6)

If value is available, it overwrite *.deliveryArea
